TimeAttackGenComp.output_name: STRING: name for summary output files
TimeAttackGenComp.output_dir: FOLDER: folder in which to copy output files (will be created if absent)
_comment_: _____Select one input file group below and delete the others: FASTQ, BAM, VCF_____
_____Keeping more than one will result in unexpected behavior!_____
_____SET REFERENCE GENOME AND TARGET INFO HERE_____
TimeAttackGenComp.target_bed: FILE: full path to BED: eg. 1000_gen/1000g_0.15MAF.refGene.uniq.bed
TimeAttackGenComp.ref: STRING: full path to snap index folder
TimeAttackGenComp.ref_fasta: FILE: full path to genome reference multi-fasta
_comment_: _____Binary locations within the docker container - should not need to change_____
